name: bunproxy-gui
description: GUI for managing multiple BunProxy instances

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:compile: bun run generate:embed && bun build --compile --minify --asset-naming=[name].[ext] ./src/index.ts --outfile bunproxy-gui
scripts.build:compile:linux: bun run generate:embed && bun build --compile --minify --asset-naming=[name].[ext] --target=bun-linux-x64 ./src/index.ts --outfile bunproxy-gui-linux
scripts.build:compile:darwin: bun run generate:embed && bun build --compile --minify --asset-naming=[name].[ext] --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./src/index.ts --outfile bunproxy-gui-darwin
scripts.build:compile:windows: bun run generate:embed && bun build --compile --minify --asset-naming=[name].[ext] --target=bun-windows-x64 ./src/index.ts --outfile bunproxy-gui-windows.exe
scripts.build:all: bun run build:frontend && bun run generate:embed && bun run build:compile:linux && bun run build:compile:darwin && bun run build:compile:windows
scripts.alldev: bun run build:frontend && bun run generate:embed && bun run dev
